actions.name: Guardian of Nature
actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares Nature's Madness.

Effect: The user and any allies of the user's choice affected a [Terrain] created by the user gain +1 DEF and SPDEF for 3 Activations.

actions.name: Guardian of Nature
actions.description: Passive: If a space within range possesses a Terrain with a Type that matches one of the user's Types, the user is affected by that Terrain.

actions.name: Nature's Madness
actions.description: Effect: On hit, all valid targets have their current HP cut in half. This attack always deals a minimum of 1 HP in damage.
